name: Grilled Bruschetta Chicken
ingredients: 4 small boneless skinless chicken breast/halves ¼ c. chopped fresh basil or 1 tsp. dried basil.
steps: ½ c. Kraft sun-­‐dried tomato vinaigrette dressing ½ c. mozzarella cheese
Place large sheet of heavy duty foil over half the grill grate; preheat grill to medium heat.
Pour 2 Tbsp. of the dressing over chicken in resealable plastic bag, seal bag. Refrigerate for 10 min.
Remove chicken from the marinade. Grill chicken on uncovered side of grill 6 min.
Meanwhile combine tomatoes, cheese, basil and remaining dressing. Turn chicken over place cooked
side up on foil. Top evenly with tomato mixture.
Close lid. Grill an additional 8 min. or until chicken is cooked through. Makes 4 servings.
Great with cooked spaghetti or steamed vegetables
